1: Review: Superb steak and sides were perfect. Great street scene. Service from Daniel was excellent. For anyone on a Keto diet, this is heaven.
2: Title: Amazing Food and Customer Service
Review: I love coming to this place! The food here is exceptional and service is just as good. They have a wide selection of wine too 🍷
3: Review: overpriced, super small portions and bad service.We had a good starter and a good glass of wine.The main course really let them down. £23 for a 100gr steak and they forgot to bring the salad supposed to be served with (we had to go inside to ask for it as it will never come). The trofie with pesto £14 (probably 80gr of trofie from a packet for each portion with a poor quantity of average quality pesto) were insipid and we are still waiting for the green beans as they forgot to put them in.I am from Genoa and I understand so the owner, so even more angry with Italians who come to London to rip people offDon’t go there
4: Review: Great food .good wine selection .very buzzy location.friendly  helpful staff with outdoor dining options
5: Review: Don’t worry about the £90 steaks, watch the beans – they’re even dearer.Also, if you get charged for an extra carafe of wine that you simply didn’t order, don’t expect to discuss it with the waiter, he’s too busy. Pay it, tip him, then wake up angry the next morning, like I’ve done.Then again, you might get a business card with "20% discount + 2 Proseccos” scribbled on it, so if you’re ever in the mood of spending £200 again, you’ll be laughing.
6: Review: I was served delicious, perfectly cooked steak by an Alpha Male waiter while quaffing Ligurian red wine. You can’t get more Italian than that!
7: Review: La cosa che abbiamo apprezzato di piu' e' stato il servizio, personale molto attento e cordiale. Si puo' ancora lavorare su certe cose ma tutto sommato una buona cena.
8: Review: Amazing food. Had diner in the cozy backyard . Perfectly cooked steak, with nice side orders. Couldn’t be happier.great meal
9: Review: Absolute gem of a restaurant ! Visited on a beautiful sunny day and sat outside We shared the Parmesan vertical for starters with fresh breads and olive oil and balsamic vinegar, felt like being in the Mediterranean! We then had the burger and the hanger steak - the quality of the meat was second to none. We had a beautiful bottle of red recommended after the one chosen was out of stock and it completed the food perfectly Was great value for money too Would 100% return!
10: Review: We went here for a lunch menu. For starter the bone marrow tartare. What a great combo of tastes. And then de steak as a main. Tip: order it as rare as possible so you get the best flavers of the meat. We Will be back voor the other dishes soon. And what a friendly staff they have
11: Review: Sat outside in the sun with 2 for 1 cocktails. The t-bone steak Florentine was to die for, sides to match. Had a brilliant time with friends, thank you
12: Review: Viandes hors de prix !!!accompagnement payant: 72€ à 3 personnes sans apéritif sans vin et sans dessert : resto à éviter
13: Review: Restaurante maravilhoso melhor de Londres! Recomendo. Entradas e prato principal encantadores! Atendimento espetacular
14: Review: Restaurante italiano fantástico, comida espetacular e melhor carne em Londres. Roberto e Fábio são os melhores !! Imperdível !!
15: Title: Could not get any better
Review: Absolutely splendid. Could not recommend highly enough. A truly authentic Italian experience and superb customer service! Till next time.
16: Review: came here with a group of mates - It was highly recommended.The service was good, starters were excellent but when the Steaks came out, they were a lot bigger than we had ordered and we all ended up leaving half.A real shame as we ended up paying for the larger cuts and leaving 50% of the fillets. The steaks were really poorly seasoned and lacked flavour.Why ask how big you want the steaks to be and then completely ignore us?
17: Title: Paradis pour les amateurs de viande !

Review: Nous sommes allés à deux reprises chez Maccellaio. La première fois était un sans faute, la deuxième nous avons eu le sentiment que le service était un peu plus… pressant. Mais cela ne gâche en rien l’expérience culinaire qui est juste parfaite pour les amateurs de viande. Je recommande fortement la pièce de viande maturée à partager à deux … un bonheur !
18: Review: I was in this bar last Week with some friends, passing it looked more like a restaurant than a bar, then we discovered that it is the bar of the Macellaio restaurant and as food they have sharing plates. Initially we used the formula 241 and were served by Alessandro who welcomed us and made us feel at home, he suggested the Fried Pasta, really good, and some signature cocktails. We spent a nice time, Alessandro was very kind and professional, fast and excellent service, beautiful location, good quality, prices slightly above average.
19:
Review: Delicious beef and good service!!!!!
 I try few Macellaio Rc but in this one the beef was amazing and the service was very friendly.
20: Review: Our steaks were very tasty and well cooked, though the starters rather average and over-priced. Merlot at £44 a bottle was poor - you can get better at Aldi for £10.
21: Title: Great restaurant let down by poor toilets

Review: Went on a whim lured in by the fantastic cuts of beef in the window (Exmouth Market). Food didn’t disappoint and staff were charming, particularly our waitress and the manager. Only disappointment, and it is a big one, were the toilets. Clean but unpleasant, as if inconsequential to the overall experience. Disabled toilet closed for repair, tight layout with dated, cheap fittings. Poor layout meant the open door to the mens’ toilet immediately adjacent to the ladies’ one is not what I wanted to see after such a wonderful restaurant experience. Manager was apologetic, understood our disappointment and handled our feedback well. 5 star food and service in a not-inexpensive restaurant, let down by 2star toilet facilities (second star only because they were clean).
22: Review: Captivating carpaccio, bountiful beef heart (not the captain), and a salivating steak shared by two. The cheesecake accompanied by a Montenegro topped things off. All the above recommended by our waiter, all the above exceeded expectations. Many thanks and will be revisiting.
23: Review: Rump steaks were stunningly good! So tasty & succulent.A few rough edges with slow/erratic service, but they were busy, and we didn't mind.Only complaint was £29 house red wine (2020 Merlot) tasted pretty awful. I mentioned this, and waitress shrugged, saying it's the cheapest wine.Bottom line - terrific steaks, but the wine needs to be improved a lot. A great restaurant needs to have a great house wine. Fix that, and you're onto a winner here!
24: Review: I got back here after around 5 years: my last visit wasn't great and I was a bit in doubt to come back. I was meeting with some ex-colleagues after a long time not seeing them and we wanted to go big. Have to say that the whole experience has been fantastic. Both the food and the wines were excellent and the service is definitely improved since my last visit. Fabio and Salvatore have done an amazing job looking after us and making sure we could have a great night. Thanks!
25: Review: Our waiter gave us a great introduction into an outstanding variety of Italian wines and took fantastic care of us all evening. The atmosphere was relaxed but classy and the food was simply delicious. If you’re looking for good steak and a good time, look no further!
26: Review: Good food and good atmosphere as always. Fabio was very good and patient with us. Great place.  Recommend it. Exmouth it’s wonderful in   Autumn.
27: Review: Sono stato da Macellaio a pranzo ed ho trovato tutto perfetto. Ho ordinato un filetto servito su pietra rovente così da poterne regolare la cottura. La mia famiglia ha preso un carpaccio di care e un hamburger anche questi piatti buonissimi. Lo staff è eccezionale e ci ha più volte chiesto come stesse andando il pranzo. Ci hanno anche offerto un antipasto (focaccia e bresaola) e un dolce (tiramisù) fantastico. La strada su cui si trova il ristorante e davvero “cozy” e accogliente, tipica della zona!! Tutto perfetto , ci tornerò sicuramente e lo consiglio assolutamente!
28: Review: Huge mistake after visiting same place in South Kensington this place was awful, food was terrible, steak overcook, salad of fennel was off, only starter of steak tartare was lovely but tiny portion The company I was with was international and mixed so they did not want to complainHowever on our experience I would never again visit this place nor would I recommend it anyone .The price of out food was astronomical in comparison with similar places , but the most unpleasant was the fact that our food was simply horrible
29:
Review: Service 5 stars Salvatore/Anita 
Extremely friendly beyond professional 
Food 5 stars Simone/Rayan 
Cocked to perfection virtually no waiting time
Overall 5 stars plus!!!!
As a Italian man I vouch for the quality of the food and service 
Ciao ciao
30: Review: Wonderful, authentic Italian food. I had an espresso with the homemade gelato. Would highly recommend for a nice meal out.
31: Review: We booked a table for a pre theatre show lunch. This restaurant is in delightful Exmouth Market, just a stones throw from Sadlers Wells. We received a welcoming, friendly greeting from the staff and were sat in a lovely spot, mid restaurant. The menu is heavily meat based, so if you don’t enjoy quality cuts of meat (beef especially) then this may not be quite so appealing to you but there were also great fresh tuna dishes on offer, which I was sorely tempted by too.I ordered the marrowbone topped with steak tartare and pomegranate seeds to start. It looked awesome and tasted amazing! It was sublime and I heartily recommend. Friends had a plentiful, delicious mixed tomato and mozzarella starter; both commented on the freshness and creaminess of the mozzarella.For mains, two of us had the freshly made beef burger with spinach and Gorgonzola on a brioche bun with hand cut chips. Another taste sensation and triumph! Our other friend selected he freshly made ravioli with a beef ragu which was again freshly prepared & exceedingly tasty. House red was a fine accompaniment for a lunchtime visit.We thoroughly enjoyed the whole ambience of the setting, the attentive and friendly service and the wonderful food - and our complimentary limoncello at the end topped it off perfectly.
32: Review: Nearly missed the restaurant as I mistook it for a butchers! However, that was a good sign of things to come! A very unusual menu with things you don't normally see (bone marrow - delicious!) and even the "run of the mill" (tomato and mozzarella) was done with a twist - and the mozzarella was the creamiest ever. The staff were lovely and helpful and this place is really handy if your visiting Sadlers Wells. Would definitely recommend.
33: Title: Ottima carne italiana a Londra

Review: Ottima carne italiana (Fassona) frollata con il metodo inglese, senza tralasciare gli squisiti dolci, in ristorante accogliente con servizio professionale, una menzione particolare per il manager Fabio e per Simone Excellent Italian meat (Fassona) aged with the English method. It’s worth to mention the delicious desserts too! All in a cozy atmosphere with professional service, a special thanks to the manager Fabio and Simone for their welcoming
34: Title: Best steak outside of Italy
Review: Next Bistecca Florentina outside of Tuscany. Lovely service and excellent wine selection. Can thoroughly recommend.
35: Review: Such an amazing afternoon. Great location, few minutes walking from kings Cross. Few new dishes for us that we came years ago! Well presented and real flavours. Thanks for looking after us so kindly. It was our belate FERRAGOSTO celebration. Great selection of wine and some by the glass as well out from menu! I couldn’t ask for more See u soon Dani & Patri
36: Title: A gem in Exmouth Market

Review: We have been here for two weeks in a row already. Simply one of the best places to eat steak in London, great selection and very friendly staff (thanks Anita!). They have also a good selection of tuna dishes and their burger is simply fantastic. To complete the picture, their homemade desserts are delicious. Truly one of the gems of Exmouth Market, a must go in London. Looking forward to coming back.
37: Review: This restaurant is a must! If you're in London and never been here it worth a dinner. The environment is friendly and professional, all the staff is well trained and every member is capable to handle busy shifts paying attention to customers. The manager is a classy man, very professional and polite. They have a very good choices of wine, which I'm very pleased to pay for the great quality. There's no competition about meat quality, they select the best animals and best cuts to provide an amazing dish. Worm atmosphere great service and stunning food (if you are a meat lover lol).Definitely worth it. Thank you especially to Daniel the manager to let us felt at home. Amazing evening
38:
Review: great food and great service! Big shoutout to the manager Daniel!! 
the food was great and service outstanding, the waiter was very attentive and friendly, I can't remember his name right now but he was great!
39: Review: Ristorante molto bello, con un'atmosfera intima e raccolta, dove è possibile trovare la tipica accoglienza e calore italiano.Il cibo era semplicemente delizioso, carne squisita, morbida e gustosa e i dolci sono da "estasi dei sensi".Il servizio è stato ottimo: personale professionale, competente, cortese e disponibile.Grazie e complimenti all'intero staff!Consiglio vivamente di trascorrere una serata in questo ristorante, all'insegna del buon cibo italiano.
40: Title: Quando non serve aggiungere altro se non grazie

Review: Avete presente quando qualcosa vi lascia senza parole e non serve aggiungere nulla perchè quello che avete vissuto è già completo di suo? Ecco questa è esattamente la sensazione che ho provato in questo locale dal primo passo per andare al tavolo, fino all'ultimo per lasciare il locale. Strada suggestiva, locale ottimo, atmosfera perfetta. Ma due cose spiccano su tutto: il personale e i prodotti.PRODOTTI - Inutile girarci attorno, la qualità è sempre la scelta migliore. Dagli affettati alla carne fino ai dolci tutto è di altissimo livello e si vede l'impegno di tutti per fornire un esperienza culinaria ottima. Tutto è fatto da loro dal pane alle salse alla pasta... tutto partendo dalle materie prime. E la carne? Un sapore unico si scioglie in bocca!!!! Esperienza pazzescaPERSONALE - Cuore. Questa è la parola chiave, CUORE! Sono ragazzi che ci mettono impegno e dedizione, e si impegnano tutti per dare al cliente un servizio ottimo. Potrei nominare qualcuno ma sicuramente rischierei ingiustamente di lasciare fuori qualcuno, non sarebbe giusto perche davvero qui meritano tutti.PREZZO - so che per molti è l'unica cosa importante ma mettiamola cosi: vuoi una serata dove niente sarà fuori posto, con prodotti ottimi, e senza rimpianti? Il posto è giusto e paghi il giusto per quello che scegli di mangiare. Non ti interessa di nulla e l'unica cosa che guardi è il basso costo? Prendi la carne, il vino e gli affettati al supermercato e cucinateli a casa. Così risparmi anche il costo dei trasporti. In ogni caso la scelta rimane sempre tua... Ho scritto molto ma alla fine bastava una parola sola per questa recensione: GRAZIE!MIRKO
41: Review: We have been here several times before and really rate it. We went again and were very shocked to see that the cheapest bottle of white wine was a few pennies short of £50, the red very slightly less. This is really disappointing, the food is very good, the place is interesting and welcoming, the service is friendly and efficient but we wont be going back. Even the Gavroche has a house white and red for around £25 - 30, see sense Macellaio and offer an affordable couple of bottles.
42: Review: I went to Macellaio few days ago and I really enjoyed the time spent there! I’ve been a few times but I saw a lot of new things,now you can also see the fassona drawing where you can see all the part of that beef . The food was awesome!! If you like Italian Wines here you can find whatever you like from South to north ..,the music and the restaurant were amazing and the service was great! The manager Daniel is the cherry on top!
43: Title: Probably the best beef you will ever eat

Review: Fourth time I’ve visited this restaurant this year and it continues to provide an excellent dining experience.The star of the show is very well matured Fassona ? beef from Italy . The large T Bone or rib to share are the best way to enjoy what this restaurant has to offer. Menu also includes Tuna dishes and pasta options but the beef is the headline act. Daniel the manager ordered in some Bottarga (tuna roe) which we had as delicious pasta starter, it was like diving into the Mediterranean sea!If you want a cheap steak go to a harvester if you flavoursome tender melt in the mouth beef which you don’t even need teeth for, come here !Superb wine list but the well priced house wine is also excellent.Service from Daniel and his colleagues was excellent as alwaysRestaurant is in a great area with a cool vibe
44: Review: I went to the restaurant with my wife, I was greeted by a very professional staff, Fabio di Cicco served me in an exemplary manner, very kind ,he had a high level of professionalism, I ate at his recommendation and everything was superlative.highly recommended.
45: Review: My friends and I have been to Macellaio a few times and we have always been treated like royalty.The service is lovely, professional and passionate, couldn't wish for anything better.The food is by far the best in the neighbourhood, probably some of the best and most carefully sourced meat and wine in London.I can only recommend Macellaio Exmouth market that will make you feel both at home and like royalty in the most lovely of decors.
46: Review: Great food and good service. We went with a big group. Service was prompt and polite and all the food went down really well.
47: Review: Amazing delicious burger and Kevin pervata was such a lovely host and made us feel very welcome. Kevin really made our experience here fantastic. Really recommend this place!! Go go
48: Title: Amazing staff & awesome quality of food

Review: We had a lovely dinner at the back yard, Sindi looked after us for the whole time, suggested dishes according to our needs.I would hundred percent recommend this restaurant not just for the quality of food which is one of the best in town but specially for the atmosphere. If you love Italian food and style you must come to this place.We will certainly come back!Thanks team Macellaio for the unforgettable evening! ❤️
49: Title: Too expensive for what they are offering

Review: The prices were obviously too high,but we decided to give it a chance.What we got was a steak for which we were never asked how we would prefer it (rare, medium or well-done).We also had to ask several times for them to bring us the bill.One more negative point,the service charge was really high as well (around 10 pounds....).Best to be avoided!
50: Review: Lovely atmosphere, food and wine. Everything was amazing, the meat was perfectly cooked, tasty and juicy. Simply wow.A must give a try to this Pearl in Exmouth market. Thank you for the lovely evening to the staff
51: Review: La pasta estaba congelada y recalentada... no tenía sabor. Si vienes aquí, no pidas la pasta. Realmente mala
52: Review: Such a treat after a long lockdown! The Fiorentina di Macellaio was absolutely delicious. and Marlene was a fantastic host for us. Would definitely recommend this for date night or a dinner with friends.
53: Title: Food - great, atmosphere - amazing and service from Marlene was fantastic!

Review: After being in lockdown, it was a delight to go to this restaurant. The service from Marlene couldn’t have been better. 
Definitely go again!
54: Review: I am from Genova and I have very high standard for pesto. Il macellaio lives up to expectations! A.Maria
55: Review: Superb choice of food and wine. Madeleine was excellent and great service all round. Would heartily recommend to my followers...
56: Title: Great place to enjoy steak
Review: Excellent friendly and helpful service, very nice dry-aged steak, not so great pasta. Nice selection of beef tartare and carpaccio for starters.
57: Review: We ordered bone marrow and ravioli for starters, followed by 600g of rib eye steak and roast potatoes. It was all very delicious. A nice surprise at the end as Camilla (our waitress) very kindly offered a dessert on the house for my partner's birthday! :)
58: Title: Fabulous steak and great service

Review: We had wanted to try this place for sometime, we had ravioli to start which was delicious and a really nice regional Italian bread stuffed with cheese. We then had beautifully flavoured and tender steaks and a lovely red from their range of carafes of wine. Food was served at a good pace and the staff were very knowledgable and friendly. Overall a great experience.
59: Review: Brilliant dinner here with friends, food was exceptional & service was outstanding! Go here, it’s fantastic.
60: Title: Delicious food and spot on service
Review: We had a delicious meal at Macellaio. The atmosphere was vibrant, food delicious and service spot on from Giacomo. Thank you for the lovely evening. We couldn’t have asked for anything more.
61: Review: My girlfriend and I had a fantastic meal here for my 30th. The manager started us out with a comped glass of bubbles before we tucked into the main course of a melt-in-your-mouth fiorentina steak (and a great bottle of wine as well). Camilla, our server, was friendly and helpful throughout as well.We've been here a few times before and will certainly be coming back. There's also plenty of room inside for Covid-safe dining - if that's something you're worried about. Each of the tables feels well-distanced from its neighbours.
62: Review: Amazing meat - we opted for a lamb steak and a fillet steak. Perfect portion sizes. Great offer currently on with the drinks - two for one! Service was second to none - will be back to enjoy for a second time
63: Title: Delicious steak in Exmouth Market

Review: One of the first places I visited after lock-down was eased, and restaurants were allowed to open. On a Thursday night Exmouth market was lively as we sat at an outdoor table. The menu is basically steak based with only a few other options, but they do cook the steak very well, and the flavour of the meat speaks for itself. Service was friendly, the wine list is via QR code including a wide range of prices.
64: Review: Siamo state a mangiare in questo ristorante. Servizio speciale e delizioso. Un particolare ringraziamento a Bruno che ha seguito in modo peculiare il nostro tavolo. Cucina semplice ,ricercata e attenta ad ogni dettaglio. Torneremo
65: Title: Great food, cocktails, and garden
Review: Really great cocktails, a nice cosy garden out back, and excellent sharing foods like burrata, beef carpaccio, and bread. Will definitely go back!
66: Review: Sono stato a cena in questo ristorante con qualche amico confidando di mangiare una buona bistecca..purtroppo la carne era oggettivamente immangiabile. Innanzitutto non ci è stata neanche chiesta la cottura, ma va bene, essendo una fiorentina ci si aspetta che sia piuttosto al sangue. La bistecca era eccessivamente cotta e presentava una crosta molto dura e difficoltosa non solo da deglutire ma anche da masticare. La peggiore fiorentina della mia vita senza dubbio. Errore nostro nel voler mangiare una fiorentina fuori dall'Italia. Pagata anche a caro prezzo.
67: Review: Absolutely fantastic, my girlfriend loved it so much that she says she’d like to come again! Xxxxxxxxxxxx
68: Review: Several starters ordered to form a main meal between two. Burratta, Focaccia extremely tasty. Tartare nice enough but OK considering the price. A warm welcome on entry. Meat hanging in fridges as decor is on brand but perhaps not to everyone's taste. Service throughout prompt enough but some delays and some misunderstandings on menu choice with little effort to remedy. Beer a little warm, plates a little small. These are small things but at £7 per pint and high prices throughout these things can matter. Minimum number of grams required to be order certain steaks, taking the price very high even for London (unwelcome but perhaps for good reason in cooking). Would recommend to meat/steak lovers. Wouldn't recommend to anyone else.
69: Title: Consigliato a tutti i carnivori

Review: Siamo andati qui perché avevano visto la puntata de “I 4 ristoranti” di Alessandro Borghese, dove questo locale aveva vinto la puntata.Comodo alla fermata della metropolitana, il locale si trova in un vicolo un po’ nascosto.La sala al piano terra è originale come arredamento e nell’allestimento, la carne veramente ottima! Tutto lo staff è italiano e sapranno consigliarvi al meglio. Noi eravamo in due e siamo andati di lunedì sera, c’era poca gente per cui non è stato necessario prenotare.Abbiamo preso due tagliate (una semplice, una con gorgonzola e noci), una patatina arrosto speziata, una focaccia bianca con crudo e stracchino all’interno, due bottiglie di acqua, un tortino al cioccolato è una cheescake e abbiamo speso 75 £. Prezzi assolutamente in media per Londra.La carne eccezionale: tenerissima, senza scarto e cotta alla perfezione! Deludenti le patate speziate che non erano molto saporite. Molto buona la focaccia e ottimi anche i dolci.Ci tornerei sicuramente!
70: Title: È la terza volta che vengo
Review: È la terza volta che vengo e la carne rimane sempre eccellente , la tartare è un must to try!! Tim disponibile e cordiale .Tappa consigliata
71: Review: Second time been in this place, previously at the wine bar where you can taste 241 cocktails and nice sharing platters. This time we opted for a table booking at the restaurant side. The food was good, nice selections of wine (we had a Negroamaro from Puglia - Italy) Outstanding was our 1kg of Fiorentina t-bone steak to share that worked out very well. The location is very good connected + there are motorcycles bays all around Exmouth Market. We'll deffo come back ;)
72: Title: A must for complete carnivores

Review: this is my 2nd visit to Macellaio and was not disappointed.  I went with a friend who I had told about it.  She now wants this to become her local go to!  Looking forward to my next visit in the new year.
73: Review: Great place! Lovely atmosphere! Amazing food! I would highly recommend! Thank you for a lovely evening!
74: Review: Ottima presenza e qualità. Servizio attento e puntuale, hanno sicuramente meritato di vincere la puntata dei 4 ristoranti di Alessandro borghese.
75: Title: Le bruschette col lardo sono un must e il tiramisù offerto da Farzana over the top!

Review: Locale accogliente, carne buonissima, bruschette col lardo fenomenali (consigliatissime).... e servizio ottimo! I ragazzi sono cordiali e simpatici, Farzana ci ha anche offerto il tiramisù (anche quello eccezionale). Insomma, lo consiglio decisamente :)
76: Review: While visiting London with a friend, we stopped by for a late evening meal. Mains start at £16-17 and that’s only for the steak.  Sides are an extra £6 and then add another £7ish for a glass of wine. A decent meal, but I have had better steaks and better service elsewhere in London.
77: Review: Se volete mangiare dell ottima carne questo è il ristorante che fa per voi.Personale molto cortese e attento e qualità eccellente.
78: Review: Great food. The meat was tender and tasty. Nice and friendly staff made it a memorable event.  Would love to visit it again.
79: Review: We went on recommendations to this place very nicely located on a small kind of pedestrian street in that area very central. Fabulous food - meat al galore !!! Definitely a must eat place for those that like quality in their plates. Very - extremely - friendly staff make you really feel welcome in this Italian meat/beef restaurant. Very reasonable when it comes to food - a little pricey but good quality on wines - it is a must experience place !
80: Review: Upon arrival the host told us that we only had 1 hour and 45 minutes to eat to which I replied that we agreed to at least two hours on the phone with the person that was confirming our booking. He then checked his diary and it turned out that we were given two hours and fifteen minutes. The host looked like he wasn’t particularly happy when he found that out. Anyways, as the weather was nice we asked if we could be sat outside as there were free tables. The host then replied that they were all reserved, fair enough it was a Friday night and we understood. However, after 10-15 minutes nobody came and took those seats at the rear garden and some seats in front of the restaurant freed up too. Then my girlfriend asked one of the waiters if we could take the seats outside and we were told that it was ok. The host didn’t look too happy. I said thank you to him too but got no reply. We stayed there for perhaps 30mins more but as we didn’t feel welcome we left after starters. The “reserved” tables never showed up and there were still empty tables outside and in the rear garden by the time we left. I guess the host didn’t really like that I argued my 1:45min time slot in the beginning. He was rude and rather arrogant. It was my girlfriend’s birthday so it was even more disappointing that we had to experience this. We moved to another restaurant down the street. On the plus side, food was lovely and our waiter was really polite and understanding that we wanted to switch tables.
81: Review: Locale piccolo ma ben curato.Servizio spettacolare, pongono molta attenzione al cliente.Carne ottima e prezzi adeguati alla qualità.Complimenti a tutto lo staff, con i loro consigli ti aiutano a scegliere al meglio tra le varie tipologie di carne, di cottura e di condimenti.Un locale che vale la pena più di una visita.
82: Title: Who needs Santore when this is across the street?
Review: Friendly staff delivering beautifully executed real Italian food. Cannot recommend this place highly enough! Ignore Santore (just down the street) and come straight here!!
83: Review: Nulla da dire su questo locale...pulizia, servizio eccellente e cibo ottimo. Si spende abbastanza ma ne vale la pena.
84: Review: I went a few days ago with my friends and colleagues of work. We booked a table for 5 and the guys treated us really kindly and friendly. The beef was incredibly tasty and the wine just perfecto! A sublime combination of flavours and Italian traditional dishes. I highly recommend this place! Staff cool and lovely! Thanks for the great experience, I will come back for sure
85: Title: Buon ristorante di carne, italiano, a Londra

Review: Buon ristorante di carne italiano, una catena con locali anche in Italia. Buona la carne e buona la sua preparazione. Molto buona la tartare servita sul midollo di manzo. Interessanti anche i dolci sempre della tradizione italiana. Servizio nella media (il fatto che la clientela sia spesso giovane e italiana non vuol dire che si possa essere sciatti). Valutazione comunque positiva.
86: Review: It was a wonderful evening, we went to Macellaio in Exmouth market for a dinner with a friends .. it was lovely, from the welcome of the staff, 2x1 aperitif, location, atmosphere, tartar and carpaccio and other stuff very very nice, tender meat and exquisite, amazing wine and finally a fantastic white basil .. all this thanks to the “savoir-faire” of the waitress who took care of us.. many thanks to the lady, Chef and Butcher and all the staff of course .. we will definitely come back. Thanks for the experience.
87: Review: We went there on a Sunday ev with a friend to enjoy the peaceful area of the Exmouth market.This place is definitely well known for the meat. Softly cooked with some fresh veggie and a glass of red wine!Very tasty, friendly Italian staff! Very good place?
88: Review: Siamo tornati dal macellaio, carne buona come sempre e posto simpatico. Un po’ alto il prezzo ma sempre una valida alternativa.
89: Review: Spotted this on Instagram and fancied giving it a try. Exmouth market is cool and the food looked great. The place didn’t disappoint nice space and buzzy. Staff friendly and the food was good (not very good). Portion size is a bit small so therefore is pricey for what you get. They forgot two side dish items but brought them at the end of the meal. There was some confusion over the wine prices. They were cheaper than we were told, which makes a pleasant change but we didn’t take the second £60 bottle and switched to a cheaper one because of the price when it was actually £36! I will go back again. But as a precaution get them to check my order and double check side dishes are on their way. And confirm the wine prices.
90: Title: buona la cucina, servizio da migliorare

Review: il punto debole di questo ristorante e' il servizio. Tutti ragazzi italiani simpatici, ma alla fine molto confusi e poco attenti. 15 min a prendere l'ordine a ristorante semivuoto. eravamo in sei, ognuno con il suo piatto, il cameriere ha insistito per un po che era meglio prendere tutti piu' o meno la stessa cosa per ottimizzare i tempi, idem per il vino - ne' abbiamo chiesto uno, ha insistito che a quel prezzo (68 pounds) era meglio prenderne' un'altro completamente diverso come vitigno e regione di provenienza. alla fine i piatti sono stati portati un po alla rinfusa, senza uno schema preciso. tartare buonissima, piatto di pasta al ragu buono ma troppo al dente.10 min alla fine per aspettare il digestivo dopo aver gia' pagato il conto (digestivo ovviamente nel conto era gia' incluso) tanto da migliorare come servizio.
91: Review: Chose to spend an evening out with a friend, we ate at this delicious Italian restaurant and we didn't regret at all. We started up with Aperol spritz and cinema negroni at their bar and tasting focaccia di recco, very good choice. Then we moved to the restaurant. The manager Valeria and the waitress Camilla truly helped us on the food choice, very ready about any question. Professional, funny and welcoming (all what you can expect to find in a restaurant).I will go back there for sure and I advice this placlle to everybody.P.s. The cheesecake was astonishing
92: Review: Visited yesterday, having booked a table in advance. On arrival, we were told that the table had been rebooked later in the evening, so that we would have to vacate within two hours. Not a good start! After being shown to our table, I requested an alcohol free beer as I was the designated driver with 120 mile journey home. I was frankly astonished to be told they don't stock any. This is unacceptable and irresponsible in today's world. I then ordered calves liver, but the waitress said this was not available (they should have told us this when the menus were brought out). I subsequently chose rump steak, which was incredibly tender and perfectly cooked. The cannellini beans were superb too, as was the dessert. However, the meat was served tiny slate square sitting on a rustic chunk of wood - can we have proper plates please? Also, for some inexpicable reason, the steak knives were jammed into the table, and left standing upright - a bizzarre and unnecessary gimmick.The biggest disappointment was the seating arrangements: I was positioned with my back to the central gangway, and despite pulling my chair in as far as possible, I was repeatedly shoved in the back every time one of the staff passed through the narrow gap. Only one of them had the courtesy to apologise.In summary, the food was great and not over-priced, but service felt rushed and the waiting staff inconsiderate and discourteous.
93: Review: I wouldn’t bother, plenty of better places to spend your money. Sides (the ones they remembered) came out way before the steak and were cold by the time we started them.
94: Title: Planter un couteau sur votre table ... Une tradition bouchère !

Review: Un petit tour dans le quartier branché bobo de Clerkenwell où nous avons fait un arrêt dans un chouette petit resto italo-viandeux.En entrant, vous vous trouvez devant un comptoir de boucher où les côtes à l'os et autre morceaux de bœuf de race Fassona du Piémont s'entassent et se maturent.La Fassona une race viandeuse persillée goûteuse un peu l'inverse du Blanc Bleu Belge...On s'installe...On commande et le serveur vient planter un couteau dans notre table. Une tradition bouchère paraît-il ...Un Spritz en apéro accompagné d'excellente bresaola...Un plat de rigatoni all'amatriciana (guanciale et Tutti quanti) pour mon épouse et un rumsteak bleu (de chez bleu) au gorgonzola et des frites pour moi....Un verre de trentangeli maresca et un autre Morellino poliziano, etc...Que du bonheur !Un peu de little italy comme à Marcinelle ou à Couillet...Au mur, trône un article de la Hockney Gazette avec la même typographie que notre Nouvelle Gazette belge...Cerise sur le gâteau: le boucher ressemble comme deux gouttes d'eau à Franco Meggetto, l'auteur italo-belge qui a écrit le Polar : la fille du Triangle et la nouvelle : le mollet.Macellaio Roberto Costa une adresse que je vous recommande quand vous passez à Londres.
95: Review: Carne davvero buona ( e’ cucinata in forno ) Da migliorare il servizio che e’ molto lento e poco attento . Dolci presentati molto bene , ho provato il latte fritto e non mi ha convinto . Ambiente piacevole , peccato che ogni volta che aprono il forno la sala si affumica ...Prezzi onestissimi per Londra.
96: Review: Went here for lunch based on menu but was pretty disappointed with what I got.The descriptions on the menu make out that it’s a bit of a temple to tuna but tbh I think I’ve cooked better tuna myself at home with fish that I got from Tescos.My seared tuna that I had was ok but really nothing special at all. The portion wasn’t particularly generous either, definitely what I call on the smaller side. There wasn’t any whole tuna out on display as the on line menu says for you to choose your piece but there was a lot of meat on display which I guess is why people go there. I think we were the only people in the restaurant not eating huge great hunks of grilled steak.The place itself is nice, the staff are friendly and it’s not unreasonably price. If you like meat it’s probably fantastic but I wouldn’t make a special journey there just to have the tuna.
97: Review: Ottima costata e fiorentina. Tartare di tonno frollato che si scioglie in bocca!Ottimo servizio e grazie ad Antonio per la professionalità e a tutti i ragazzi in sala.
98: Review: Ottima carne e soprattutto personale gentilissimo. Che dire, meglio di tanti altri posti più blasonati ma non a ragione.
99: Review: Volevamo mangiare carne. Questo ristorante ci sembrava adatto. Non avediamo prenotato ma la manager Valeria ci ha detto che in 20 minuti ci avrebbe procurato il tavolo. E così è stato! Il locale non è ampio ma è accogliente. Il bancone delle carni in vista. Abbiamo scelto una bistecca che Valeria ci ha fatto vedere prima della cottura. Il personale di sala Gentile e rapido. Gli spinaci di contorno ottimi. I dolci deliziosi. Il vino ottimo. Il costo proporzionato alla qualità della ristorazione che nella globalità giudichiamo ottima per cui non economico
100: Review: If you like your steak then this is the place to come. They do offer other dishes but once you’ve seen the meat displayed, as you’re taken to your table, then it’s a no brainer. It was booked by my son for my partner and I together with his fiancé and my partner’s son. The three males shared the “Valentino” option steak recommended by the waiter. We were unsure initially whether it would be sufficient but we needn’t of worried, it fitted the bill brilliantly. My partner had a pasta dish as a main and my son’s fiancé plumped for the chicken. I’m not a desert person but I have to recommend both the tiramisu and cheesecake which I tried. Service was first class, very helpful when trying to decide on which steak to order.
101:
Review: Lovely spring day
Sitting outside drinking prosseco with two fellow functioning alcoholics
Food is for meat eaters only which I am not
My mates enjoyed the complimentary salami
102: Review: Ristorante che, definirlo spettacolare, è un diminutivo...Servizio preciso, personale cordiale e disponibile.Una volta al tavolo ci siamo fatti consigliare sulle specialità del locale e sono bastate poche parole per convincerci su un piatto che non ha deluso le aspettative.Cottura della carne perfetta, il che lascia dedurre che chi sta in cucina sa fare il suo lavoro (e non la bella statuina)....una delizia per il palato.A fronte di tutto ciò, anche l'occhio vuole la sua parte e cosa dire se non che il colore della carne era una meraviglia; così come l'ingresso del ristorante:un bancone da macellaio con tutti i pezzi di carne pronti per essere tagliati al momento dell'ordinazione e destinati alle braci.Il primo vero ristorante italiano a Londra... I miei complimenti a tutto lo staff del "Macellaio". Non cambiate...
103: Title: Uno dei miei posti preferiti quando voglio sentirmi a Casa

Review: Abbiamo provato sia il ristorante che serve la carne migliore provata a Londra fino ad ora sia il piccolo barattino che ogni giorno dalle 5PM alle 9PM serve ottimi cocktails, 2 al prezzo di uno. Personale molto cordiale che ci ha sempre fatto sentire a casa e coccolate
104: Review: Perfektes Steak in unkomplizierter Atmosphäre. Sehr aufmerksamer und freundlicher Service und gute Weinauswahl.
105: Title: Amazing service during happy hour

Review: We are Italians, we were looking for an italian aperitivo on a Sunday afternoon. We came across this place while walking in Exmouth Market, as soon as we walked in we felt like we were at home. The bartender, Barbara was amazing and she was very helpful with choosing the drinks. We have been there for about three hours and we ended up chatting with Barbara most of the time. She made us try different specialities with each drink and overall was an amazing experience. Would highly recommend it!
106: Review: We came here for st valentines and the experience was great overall as the quality of the food was amazing and the service excellent.Couple of points I did not appreciate, but understand as I work in the same industry :- you cannot order at all from the bar menu so it means you cannot eat the fab super focaccia at the restaurant - trofie with pesto had no taste at all: did not taste pasto and there was no salt at all. This is a delusion as this should be their best pasta dis- tables x 2 tops are too close to each other so this makes you feel uncomfortable For the pasta they recovered by offering side dishes but we could not eat them as they arrived too late and we had a lot of food. I will be returning for sure, especially for the focaccia as it was amazing.I strongly suggest this place
107:
Review: favourite place to eat in the area. 
Incredible food, great wine and fantastic service. 
Highly recommended.
108: Review: Well, if you’d like to have a fabulous dinner in London, these Italians may help you... quality service, quality  meal, good and cheap wine... what ever you would expect for? Ask to be served by Barbara... She always eat there, for sure!
109: Title: Italian food with no heart

Review: We were really looking forward to this meal. We’d done our research and reviewed the reviews. On the plus side. All of the ingredients were super. Great steak, wine, fries, pasta. Here’s the but... no heart; no passion, no friendliness, no engagement. Nothing Italian here. The caring friendly spirited happy family side of Italy that most of us love. No half portions of pasta for prima piatti (management don’t allow that). No offer of bread to clean the bowl - Scarpettii. No engaging in discussions about Italy. God I tried. Disappointed. But the food is good. If you like to eat in an unwelcome atmosphere.
110: Review: Avevamo prenotato la mattina per la sera, arriviamo al ristorante e ci dicono che avevano cercato di contattarci per dirci che non avevano un tavolo per otto persone ma la ragazza gentilissima ci dice che siccome non erano riusciti a mettersi in contatto con noi ci hanno riservato un tavolo in un altra loro sede. Per scusarsi ci hanno OFFERTO un bicchiere di PROSECCO e una pizza fatta dallo chef(molto buona) se non bastasse ci hanno PAGATO il taxi. Per il resto il cibo è ottimo anche per i tagli di carne succosi e cucinati perfettamente. Locale top ottima scelta e ottimo personale ci ritornerò sicuramente.
111: Review: Came here with friends pre theatre. The place is fun with a good atmosphere and the food was ok. My pasta was tasty but a bit undercooked so not very impressed. Quite an expensive place for what it was.
112: Review: Everything we ordered was very good. The services was exellent, and the red wines were very high quality.  I love this place!
113: Review: Hospitality, great choice of wine, excellent food. A special thanks to Paola and Barbara. We will be back as soon as possible!
114:
Review: Fantastic night with two friends. 
Loved the meat (Costata) and the wine. 
Excellent service and amazing people!
For sure we will come back! 
Thank you.
115: Title: Warm and rustic interior, good a for a date place

Review: Interior sets the mood for a good date place or catch up with a friend. Best to like steak and red wine as these are the two things Macellaio specialise in. We shared a steak and sides. The steak was ok but the meat still fairly chewy, which for the price and cut was not great. Service was very good.
116: Title: Delicious evening spent in Macellaio

Review: I had a delicious dinner in this italian restaurant with friends, started off with aperitif at the bar and then tasted this amazing meat and starter.All staff was really charming and welcoming.I do suggest to visit this place.
117: Title: Un po’ d’Italia nella city

Review: Ristorante davvero molto carino, arredamento classico da ristorante italiano.Personale gentile, simpatico e competente.Cibo molto buono e materie prime di qualità. Prezzi alti, ma in linea con i ristoranti di questa categoria a Londra.
118: Review: Amazing food despite the busy Saturday night. Great service as well, very careful to details and to the customer's need. We received our antipasti within 10 minutes, and the wait between one course and the other was always short. Meat is the best we have had in months, comparable to high quality Italian meat.Can't wait to go back there!
119: Title: Italia in Inghilterra...perchè la nostra cucina é insuperabile e loro ne sono la prova!

Review: Abbiamo cenato con amici un sabato sera, un ristorante italiano come pochi se ne trovano anche in Italia, antipasti che spaziano dal sud al nord Italia con una freschezza e varietà di prodotti davvero da 5 stelle! accoglienza calorosa e servizio molto professionale, pochi tavoli curatissimi, piatto principale che tutti devono provare è carne per la quale tutti i ristoranti Macellaio RC sono famosi, ma senza dimenticare gli antipasti (provare assolutamente tartare con gorgonzola e il carpaccio con robiola!) se non sapete cosa scegliere lasciatevi consigliare dai camerieri (tutti italiani tra l'altro) e non sarete delusi! e lasciatevi tentare anche dal dessert perchè i tartufini fatti in casa ed il brownie sono da provare assolutamente! la manager Valeria, tra l'altro della nostra città percui sorpresa più che gradita ,ci ha veramente fatto sentire a casa! Ottimi anche i vini ed il caffé all'italiana (cosa rara!) un rapporto qualità prezzo veramente unico! consigliatissimo!!!! bravi e a presto perchè torneremo sicuramente!
120: Title: Meagre portions making it hugely overpriced!

Review: I went on a Sunday night, asked to sit in the warmer looking bar area but were told we could only eat in the empty restaurant, my tuna starter was pitifully small, steak was ok but have had a lot better. Had an average wine for £38. This place lacked ambience and typical of London restaurants any generosity of spirit. Really disappointing way to spend £150 for two, left feeling cheated!
121: Title: Used to the South Kensington one, experience at Exmouth Market one was a bit disappointing.

Review: Went for dinner. I would mostly consider the disappointment due to the inexperience of the waiting staff. It appears that they try too hard, making it all a bit awkward as it's not done smoothly. I may like a continuous advice if i see the experience and the knowledge there, otherwise i'd rather not. The wine ordering was very painful and confusing: this wine is in the list but we don't have it, this other one we only have enough for 2 glasses, this other one we don't have but let me check, actually yes we have it.....The starters were really good however they really took forever to arrive and we had to chase twice as everyone seemed unaware that we had been waiting forever. We got a free bread basket as an apology which was nice but honestly quite a little gesture.The meat ordering also not smooth. We were talked into ordering far more meat than necessary: started from one size, then suggested we have it a bit bigger which we said ok, in the end it arrived even bigger because "it's cut on the moment"....result: a very significant bill and lot of leftover meat. The meat was nice (i had better at southken but this one still was good). Frankly the meal itself was nice but the experience was indeed affected by all the above. We would give it another go but probably at a different location.
122: Review: I was for the first time last night with my girlfriend, we found a clean and well organized place. Not to mention the staff who are very prepared on the whole menu. Great service, great staff and above all great food.
123: Review: Sono stata qui per la prima volta con 3 amici, bhé che dire personale molto preparato, disponibile e cortese! Cibo super super buonissimo. Tutto super eccellente! Continuate così.
124: Review: Premise: lunch menu is not so wide as the dinner one. Apart from that, too small portions and too high prices for the location and the complexity of the dishes themselves
125: Title: The best steak in London
Review: The best steak I have ever had in London. Special thanks to Barbara for her recommendations. Costata is really delicious!
126: Review: A very positive experience. Thank you to Barbara and the Macellaio RC team for making this a successful team building night out! We enjoyed the food, wine, service and atmosphere to the outmost. From information request to walk out Macellaio RC showed timely and professional costumer service. The dinner was enjoyed by an international group of people with different dietary requirements. The staff was responsive to our needs and the service was smooth. Diners from 4 different continents enjoyed the flavours of all four courses. Hope to be back soon! Bravi!
127: Review: We all know Italy is famous in the world for being a country of food passionates. But it’s not easy to find a place outside of Italy that tickles Italians’ heart when it comes to food. In London this kind of place exists: Macellaio (The Butcher) concept of Roberto Costa. This is the first butcher in London who offers table services and a complete dining experience, recreating the atmosphere of a cosy and warm Italian trattoria. I went to the Exmouth Market branch, but there are 4 other branches in London in Fitzrovia, South Ken, Union street and others. The hanging beef thighs in exposition in the windows are a piece of art and will get you salivating immediately, making it almost impossible not to ask for a table when you pass by.The specialties of the house cover mountain and sea: meat and tuna. The meat comes rigorously from the Fassona breed from the valleys north of Genova, whereas the tuna is fished in the Sicilian sea. Everything is served fresh or dry aged in the contemporary sharing cicchetti style meats, fresh mountain cheeses and artisan breads. We ordered all the flagship dishes of the house (all in pics attached):- the famous T-bone steak (“fiorentina style), in the pic attached, butchered in front of us and served still bleeding. - the Tuna Tartare sculpted by Donatello in person. - the Bone Marrow, meat “all albese”, served with oil, pomegranate and parsley.The wine list is simply extraordinary and shows big character. Highly recommended the red wines from the best regions: the Piedmont, with Nebbiolo, Barbaresco, Barolo and Tuscany with Montepulciano, Brunello and Chianti. In summer you can seat outside, in the heat of the chatty pedestrians street, with people walking up and down Exmouth market looking for a place like this.Not to miss also the other 4 branches, as each has its own specialty on top of tuna and meat: artisan pizza, focaccia from Liguria and other delights.Ideal for couples and big groups. Make sure you ring them in advance before turning up.
128: Review: Excellent service by Antonio and Camilla! Very good quality! Highly recommended! !!!'🚀🚀✨😉😊👌🏻👌🏻
129: Title: Best place to have a great steak!
Review: Antonio and Camilla are lovely, good service, cool bar. Excellent environment, you should definitely go!
130: Review: I like the food here. It is good. When I eat it I like the feeling in my mouth and how I feel after. The wine is nice, and tastes good in my mouth. It is good with the meat which is red. I like that too.Thanks
131: Title: Inconsistent food and poor service

Review: Came for my partners birthday, super special treat for us we don’t get to eat out a lot. The staff were slow and unwelcoming. My steak was lovely but my partners was over cooked (he’d asked for medium) we sent it back and they return with a steak that was rare. The chips were lovely but the mash was lumpy and couldn’t taste any garlic or flavour in the spinach. Really disappointing. Too shy to ask grumpy staff for service charge to be taken off or any sort of refund.
132: Title: Viaggio di piacere a Londra.
Review: Ottima serata passata con gusto grazie alla qualità ed il buon gusto dei piatti serviti.Speriamo di riuscire a tornarci prima di ripartire per l'Italia.Grazie della cena e good luck.
133: Title: restaurant uniquement pour la cote de boeuf
Review: cote de boeuf excellente mais ne prenez pas de plats italien ! burrata insipide pates au pesto ou aux tomates sans interet. Personnel agréable.
134: Review: Posto molto carino, personale eccezionale, veloce e sempre attento. Carne buonissima e di qualità.Un ringraziamento particolare a la Manager Valeria per la sua professionalità ed accoglienza.Consigliatissimo!!!A presto !
135: Review: Food is great, the portions aren't very big, it's also pricey. Cannot fault the quality and the setting though. We had a lovely time but i wouldn't rush back.
136: Review: We had a fabulous lunch at Macellaio, nothing refined just great ingredients cooked and served with total respect. All very mouth-wateringly delicious. We had a mixture of starters and the Fiorentina steak between 5 of us......Perfect!!All the staff were very friendly and helpful. Great choice of wine.We shall return with our doubtGrazie Mille
137: Review: Ottima l'accoglienza, in particolare dalla ragazza che gestisce il locale e organizza le ordinazioni. Dopo essere stati accompagnati al tavolo ci è stato spiegato in modo molto esaustivo l'origine delle diverse carni e delle diverse portate, OTTIMA LA QUALITÀ E IL PREZZO, adatto sia per portate a singola persona sia per più persone (come nel nostro caso). Ci siamo trovati benissimo! Abbiamo mangiato da RE! Ve lo consiglio col cuore :)
138: Review: Unico, carne buonissima, migliore di Londra. Staff molto cordiale e professionale. Consiglio a tutti i miei amici e sicuramente ritornerò.
139: Title: hands down best italian meat experience
Review: For an authentic italian meat experience make ur way here!Great limoncello! Great panacotta! Amazing italian cheese ham and everything else...
140: Title: Great food, wine, staff and atmosphere.
Review: This is place has great food, wine, staff and atmosphere. Had a great array of dishes and the steak was fantastic
141: Title: Amazing meal in the heart of Exmouth market
Review: Such a great restaurant, an incredible selection of dishes and some of the finest Italian meats I've had in a long time! Definitely recommend the rib eye steak.
142:
Review: Go for the meat over the starters, both are amazing but the steaks are exceptional!

Wonderful service!
143: Review: I’ve been here a couples of time and never let me down. Good services great food and friendly atmosphere.
144: Title: Great little place - feels just like home!

Review: Been coming here quite often lately; the staff is lovely, wine is incredible! Great selection and if you’re unsure they would help you! The steaks are to die for! Best fiorentina in town. 10/10! Will definitely be back!
145: Review: Myself and a close group of friends visited the Macellaio chain last night. When we first arrived with rumbling bellies our eyes were alight by the array of meat on display - I thought I was in for a good evening!We occupied the second table of the dinner service and once seated we were left to peruse the quirky menu (newspaper design).A gentleman who I believed to be the head waiter came to the table to give suggestions about the dishes and type of meat and weight we may require. Seeing as there are 5 in the group we decided to share a number of starters (which were all good) & following the waiters suggestion we decided to share a Steak.He brought over two beautiful cuts of T-bone Steak weighting 2.5kg - I personally have a huge appetite but even this was too much meat for me. For this amount it would have cost roughly £180... we requested some time to discuss options between the group and eventually decided that we would prefer 1kg of fillet, this was closer to the £100 mark - to which we requested from the head waiter.I'm not sure if this decision upset him but he went away to see whether this amount could be cut... that was the last input he had with our group. We weren't even asked how we would like the meat cooked!Fortunately the steaks ranged from rare to medium and all in all we were pleased with the mains we received and the accompanying sides (chips, mash, spinach & salad). It was disappointing that we had to ask for the dessert menu on two separate occasions and then to still not receive it - to me this screamed we were no longer welcomed guests, I asked for the bill and departed. The food was good, shame about the service - it would have been pleasant if asked if we were enjoying/enjoyed the food. Work to be done...
146: Review: Looked forward to what seemed a nice quaint restaurant, but was really disappointed. The staff lingered awkwardly whilst we ordered, wasn’t really able to offer quality menu advice. Didn’t offer butter as an option with bread (only used in the kitchen?). Served our dinner just after my wife went to the toilet. Served washed out spinach. I ordered my steak rare, my wife medium rare. My wife’s appeared rare and mine medium. The wine was great but advertised as a carafe but came as a half carafe. No one asked for feedback during or after our meal and then got really grumpy when I said I wasn’t going to pay the service charge that had been automatically added to the bill. My wife at this point wanted to raise our concerns as feedback, and instead of looking to make amends, they replied we hope it’s better next- that’s never going to happen.
147: Title: Good but more money for its value...

Review: Going through TripAdvisor I found this restaurant belonging in the mid-priced area and offering good steaks so we gave it a try. Service was fantastic, ambience and music a great success but... the rump steak advertised by the waitor for being "up to" 6 weeks aged was not as tender as it should be and delivered cut in pieces (looking quite smaller than the original piece and with no way of checking it, usually this is done in front of you). Great side dishes, some wonderful potato fries with skin. Smaller burrata and steak tartar portions than expected. We paid around 50 Pounds Stirling per person which for the dinner we had was too much.
148: Title: Best service from Antonio and incredible food

Review: Big group of 9 of us had the most incredible meal. All planned our meal and Antonio recommended a tapas style meal so we could try everything. It was up there with the best meat I have ever had. Highly recommend!!
149: Review: As always the best restaurant in Exmouth market! Valeria knows how to manage her shop, service is always perfect and food is amazing! See you soon
150: Review: We weren’t sure where to go for dinner - but the menu drew us in. Steak was wonderful - and a real opportunity to see how fresh it was. Steak tartare was well seasoned, and I would thoroughly recommend the apple cake (and the cheese board!) extensive wine least to suit all budgets, and some available by the carafe which is perfect if you don’t want a full bottle. Buzzy ambiance and good service - would recommend.
151: Review: 4 courses of some of the best food I've tasted in London. The service was great, especially Barbara with her advice.
152: Title: Raw meat never smelt so good!

Review: Authentic and rustic, this place bring good food, service and drinks together in a comfortable authentic setting. 

Highly recommend
153: Review: Went with a friend for my Birthday. Fabulous place. Great atmosphere. Good service. Our waitress Barbara was a star. Really friendly and helpful. The food was high quality and just delicious. The portion sizes were good. I didn’t pay, so not sure of the prices, but certain it was well worth it. I would highly recommend this restaurant.
154: Title: Nice evening spent in a delicious place

Review: Well, no words to describe a cozy, lovely italian restaurant. I and my friend popped in for a bottle of wine, tasty starter and a delicious meat. The price is worth it.
Can't wait to get back!
155: Review: I’ve been in this restaurant with my girlfriend for a sunday lunch out and I really enjoyed the place, the staff and the exceptional quality of the food.Amazing Wine List, beautiful wines from all over Italy, beef carpaccio is a must if you go.We had 1 Kg beef Rib that the butcher cut in front of us at the moment and then they grilled it.Cannot find the words to describe it.Lovely service, Paola and Alessandro were taken care of us.Can’t wait to come back.
156: Review: This place is fabulous! The food is just delicious. Everything they serve is beautifully prepared and of the highest quality. The staff are really friendly too. It's a really cute little place that you could easily miss altogether when walking past, but absolutely worth trying out if you do notice it. You won't be disappointed!
157: Review: Abbiamo iniziato con degli antipasti suggeriti dalla cameriera di carne cruda con burrata e stracciatella seguiti da un'ottima costata che abbiamo diviso.L'atmosfera è davvero familiare la cucina è ottima e il servizio è impeccabile.Oltre alla carne abbiamo apprezzato anche i dolci e il vino!
158:
Review: Delicious! fantastic food, atmosphere and staff! Barbara and Camilla made us feel at home! we will recommend it to all our friends who will pass to London!
Non
159: Review: Macellaio restaurant in exmouth market has always friendly Italian staff and the best steaks i have tasted in London! Healthy meal as well with nice green sides to go with your meat and a nice selection of wine. It is a real treat to have dinner there. I'll recommend it!
160: Title: Best steak I’ve had in London
Review: Tried steak at a couple other places and this was my favourite by far, the prime beef if the best, pesto pasta and burrata, lovely staff also
161: Title: Refreshing cocktails, authentic Italian food and amazing service

Review: We went here for a friend’s leaving drinks and were welcomed with refreshing spritzers and unique cocktails. The meat and snacks were amazing - especially the Genovese focaccia. Special thanks to Mauricio for making our evening extra special with his service, care, and unique drinks for our guests of honour! Definitely coming back here, especially for happy hour.
162: Title: Easy e di gusto. Ottimo ristorante. Andateci!

Review: Sono stato in questo ristorante la settimana scorsa. Serata davvero piacevole con amici, ottima bistecca di fassona, vini italiani. Non abbiamo provato il pesce ma a quanto pare sembra che il locale eccella anche sul tonno.. Locale molto easy nonostante l'ottima carne in un area carina della città. Ve lo consiglio!
163: Title: Non potevamo non tornarci: tutto eccezionale! Provare per credere!

Review: E' la seconda volta che mi reco a Londra con la mia famiglia. Ero già stato in questo ristorante nel gennaio 2017 ed avendo avuto un'ottima impressione per la qualità dei cibi, la competenza e la disponibilità del personale, la vasta scelta di vini di pregio e la tranquilla e graziosa location, non potevamo non tornarci. Confermo, quindi, tutto ciò che scrissi nella recensione del 19 gennaio 2017: ottimi antipasti misti atti a soddisfare i gusti di tutti i commensali, tagliata di carne dall'unico delicato sapore ed una tenerezza eccezionale, bistecca di tonno veramente speciale, contorni particolari e gustosissimi, vasta scelta di ottimi vini suggeriti di volta in volta dal personale per un abbinamento perfetto, scelta di dolci unici e particolari come, ad esempio, il delicatissimo "bianco al basilico". Il personale bilingue non crea problemi a chi non sa l'inglese, è competente, disponibile e sempre pronto a far che ci sì senta a proprio agio. Il rapporto qualità-prezzo è ottimo. Da provare assolutamente!
164: Title: family & friends, great atmosphere, fun, amazing food and drink.............

Review: what else could you ask for! We visited this trendy laid-back carnivore's delight for a Saturday night celebration evening. The menu was amazing with the huge steaks on display as you arrive. The chef axes of a huge joint of fresh t-bone or cut of your choice, cooked to your perfect choice of liking. Its then carved in a big platter for all meat eaters to share, simply amazing!Personally, I'm a pescetarian, not a problem, a wide selection of fresh Tuna available in different cooking styles. Surprisingly the Tuna was one of the best I have tasted! The staff were so friendly and helpful to the right degree, not in your face but always there to satisfy your every need. A wonderful experience and look forward to visiting again.
165:
Review: Excellent meat! Very good food for money.
The service and ambience is very nice! 
It is quite a busy place so it is recommended to book before go. The wines list it is very vast and they have great Italian wines for a good value!
166: Title: Oh man, did we ever pick the wrong day. But it's pretty good

Review: So, it was sweltering when we went here. Outside the street was crammed with minimally clothed people drinking beer and eating street food. I was with a colleague, early for a meeting and both starving. I am carb-dodging right now so I was looking for meat. And boy, did I find it.This place is meat heaven. We pretty much had the place to ourselves and we ordered a T-bone to share (minimum size 800g), with some heart on the side and some greens. The cutlery arrives with a slightly theatrical stab of the steak knives into the table. The meat arrives cooked perfectly, already sliced and ready for a mega-meat-blow-out.What can I say? Steak at its simplest, with just a little salt and mustard, needs to be pretty fabulous to make it feel OK to spend nearly £100 for two people, at lunch, without booze, on a weekday, before a meeting.It felt better than OK. My blowout venue of choice from now on...
167: Review: I attended this restaurant prior to a performance at Sadler's Wells Theatre on June 28th 2018. The food was exquisite. I had fillet steak to die for and it was cooked and presented with the greatest of love and care. The waiters and waitresses were attentive and caring and had our best interest at heart. I highly recommend this restaurant for food, ambiance, care and passion. Antonio , our waiter deserves a medal!!!Much appreciated and thank you. x
168: Title:  You have to tried this! Amazing!

Review: I love this place! A very nice restaurant in exmouth Market. Warm welcome from members of staff, friendly and knowledge about different type of meat, you can feel the Italian passion when they talk about food. Valeria and the team treat us really well. Milanese is huge. The chef was amazing. We gonna never stop coming here. Loved it.
169: Review: Durante una domenica in giro per Londra, abbiamo deciso di tornare in questo ristorante. La scelta è stata veramente opportuna, abbiamo mangiato della carne favolosa...Ci torneremo anche se.....è un po'...caro....
170: Review: We booked a group of us into Macellaio with a belief that it was our type of place and we were not wrong. Our type of place serves excellent ingredients which have not been unduly fussed about with. I cannot describe how happy we were with the result. We chose to have one piece of meat cooked for all five of us and there was nothing left at the end of it.This is not a place for vegetarians, the meat is the star and they do it proud. Tell them what you like and let them choose and prepare it you will not be disappointed.
171: Title: Best Pannacota served by a fantastic smiley Claudia!

Review: We came at 8:30pm on the Monday of the last May bank holiday. They welcomed us warmly served us quickly. They sugggested different tuna-based dishes which came accompanied by fennel, oranges and beans. They also recomented a delicious merlot. All accompanied by smile and fun chats. He dinner finished with basil-based panna cotta recommended by a fantastic Claudia!
172: Title: Perfektes Steak und klasse Service

Review: Eher zufällig schauten wir in die Theke und sahen grandioses Fleisch. Dem mussten wir eine Chance geben. Es gibt eine kleine aber feine Karte, die Steakberatung von Antonio ist einfach klasse und auch der Service super. Das Fleisch ist absolut perfekt genauso wie die Beilagen. Zwar nicht ganz günstig, aber jeden Cent wert. Wir fanden es so gut, dass wir am nächsten Tag wieder dort waren. Mille Grazie
173: Title: Great meat, bad pushy service

Review: The 5 stars are just for the quality of the meat, which is really superb. We had a bad service experience though. The thin little girl was constantly asking us if we were ready and once we were she didn’t even ask what we want, she just tell us to buy the two most expensive things on the menu. My girlfriend said she wants a fillet and she was like “no, better if you not, take the Fiorentina”. We were literally on the verge to stand up and leave. She was italian and we are italians so we know type of meat they are serving. Other bad thing they tried to bring the plates away before we finish. It was 8.30pm, restaurant was not full, no one was outside waiting, we explained we were not on a rush so we didn’t really like this rush in the service and being pushy in overselling before even ask what we want. It’s a shame because the quality of the food is amazing, portions are ridicolous for the prices, but the quality really worth it, the service not.
174: Title: Authentic Italian food, amazing dinner

Review: I read in somebody’s review that food is average but I have to say that those who wrote this do not understand or never tastes real Italian food. Well, listen me carefully: Il Macellaio offers the best selection of Italian’s meat, Italian food and Italian’s hospitality. It is the best restaurant in town. The Fiorentina steak we had (along with appetizers, baked potatoes and a bottle of Chianti’s wine) is the best treat you can have. The steak was delicious (Fiorentina is the t-bone by the way), smooth, delicious. The service was superbe, the staff is so friendly, warm and attentive. We were attended by Antonio and Claudia, two young, enthusiastic and professional guys who served us in a superbe way and who deserve our great feedback (anyhow the whole staff is very friendly and professional too).If you want to taste authentic Italian meat at the same way we cook and eat in Italy, please pay a visit to this fantastic restaurant which offers the highest quality standard of Italian cuisine in London. Please do not miss a dessert and some limoncello to end up your dinner. You will feel in heaven. Enjoy your meal!We have travelled all over the world, and we rarely found such a great quality and such a friendly service. Enjoy Italy and Italian cuisine!Simona and Luis, Italy
175: Title: Doing the People's Post Tour (which was brilliant).

Review: Had a break for lunch during the tour and found this restaurant which had spare tables. While the staff were friendly and efficient the menu was a bit sparse. The food however was very tasty. Be aware that the tip is already added to the bill and mobile phones are not banned. Not a restaurant we shall be revisiting.
176: Review: Ogni volta che veniamo a Londra nn ci facciamo sfuggire qs ristorante, ottimo cibo ... carne favolosa ... personale simpatico e professionale ... come da veri Italiani!!Grande anche Valeria ... ti segue e consiglia benissimo!!!
177: Review: Fantastic food, the waiter Antonio guided us through the menu, gave us options we wouldn't normally order and WOW!!! Food was amazing, good atmosphere. Great prices too. Thanks Antonio and everyone there
178: Title: What more could you want?

Review: 7 of us went here for Dinner, I had heard good things and it definitely met those expectations.What more do you want? Good food, great service and a fun atmosphere.I want to say special thanks to Antonio, Michele, Diego and Valaria who all made sure we had a good evening.
179: Review: We visit Macellaio in Exmouth Market quite often as we live 5 minutes walking from this lovely street. The meat (costata or fiorentina) is always amazing and of great quality, as well as all the other dishes and especially the desserts.The atmosphere is nice and also the service.. Antonio is a very competent, quick and polite waiter that provides an excellent service to customers. TO TRY
180: Review: Average meat seasoned with decent olive oil and salt to cheat the client. Sidings sound good on the menu but are not delivering the expected. In summary, you better avoid this place and grab a pizza nearby if you need food.
181: Review: We had a really good night at the restaurant last night! Really nice food, good selection of wine, and excellent service from the all the team i mean chefs waiters and barman they were very friendly and polite! I raccomand this restaurant to anyone who love's eat stakes drink good wines and been served from friendly and polite staff!
182: Review: Antonio and Valeria were outstanding!! Amazing service from both of them! Thank you! Forget the average, best meat in London, my favourite place! Thanks all! We will come back soon!
183: Review: I really would recommend you to eat to Macellaio near Angel! The food is amazing and we had a great experience here also because we had the luck to be served by Valeria and Antonio! Valeria knows everything about the product and she will recommend you the best options! Antonio is charming and he is always double check if you have everything you need! This is great! Thanks all for your amazing service! 5 star restaurant
184: Review: High quality meat and nice and friendly staff. Antonio and Valeria did their best to let us fully enjoy our dinner. I would come back.
185: Review: Antonio and Valeria have been super attentive and friendly, great service and the  T-bone steak (italian Fiorentina)...MAMMA MIA, amazing, very succelent. Never tried a meat so tender. Higly recommended!
186: Review: Carne squisita! Consiglio la costata, tagliata davanti ai nostri occhi dopo averla ordinata.Il personale é fantastico (Valeria anche molto attenta al gluten free) ci siamo sentiti a casa!
187:
Review: Delicious meat and super friendly staff! 
The best place in the area to have a proper Italian meal. I love wine and here I found a really good selection of wine!
188: Review: I have been here for a graduation party of a friend of mine on tue 24/4. I had the chance to try lot of amazing Italian food , everything nice and tasty, really cozy and beautiful location, and thanks to Valeria for the excellent service!!
189: Review: Sono venuto qui per fare un aperitivo di Laurea, e mi sono trovato benissimo. Location fantastica, servizio eccellente, specialmente da Valeria, gentilissima e professionale
190: Title: Only the Steak is Great

Review: Tried Macellaio for the first time and almost certainly the last. Ask yourself this.... Do you want to pay £45 for a steak, sitting in the back of a rough and ready café, and then be charged an extra £5 for chips of quite poor quality? The steaks are priced by weight, and they tell you the weight but you have to do the maths yourself. It was exceptionally good steak, cooked perfectly but I've had as good cheaper in nicer surroundings... And then there's the toilets. The unisex toilets are dark, dank, and dirty. I was pleased to stand, ladies will choose to hover and my other half elected to hold on and wait. My advice is to check your wallet and the toilets before committing to a steak.
191: Title: Very good food but felt rushed

Review: We would recommend Macellaio for the food. The appetizers were very good (burrata) and main of steak good, sides of red cabbage and fries were excellent. The apple pie to finish was also very good. However, we had barely ordered our appetizers when they arrived. We hadn’t even sipped the wine! Upon finishing our appetizers, the main arrived within 2-3 minutes!! This was a shame as after large appetizers you don’t immediately wish to have your main so quickly. We felt this was far far too fast. So very good food, but far too eager on delivery.
192: Review: We'd previously visited Macellaio in Southwark for a Butchery Masterclass. The food was exceptional, but unfortunately some elements of the class setup didn't quite meet expectations. Knowing this, the team very kindly invited us back for a second chance and to restore our faith in what they can do.We decided to try a different location, as we were already keen to head to their site in Exmouth Market. It's a relaxed and informal setting, with a brilliant busy local vibe. Diego met us on arrival and took us to our table, and from there he led the evening - from choosing the best dishes for us, pairing it with some amazing Italian wines and explaining everything in front of us. He was a great host, even on a particularly busy evening, and it was beyond our expectations; we very much appreciated it. The food was as good as we remembered - with steak and tuna tartare to start, followed by a steak main with vegetables and spinach, and an incredible panna-cotta and a chocolate brownie to finish. It all tasted amazing, We left the restaurant and moved to their bar next door for one last night cap before heading off.The staff have always been incredibly friendly and very welcoming. We would definitely recommend visiting to give it a try! We'll be back again soon :)
193: Review: Come ultima tappa londinese, sono stato in questo ristorante/macelleria italiano a pranzo e non ho avuto bisogno di prenotare. Gentilissimo il personale, in parte italiano, ottima soprattutto la carne, ben frollata e gustosissima. Consiglio sicuramente di far tappa in questo luogo. Complimenti
